duties_responsibilities.duty: Greeting customers, running the register, cashiering, making purchase suggestions, and sometimes working with the food program.
Maintaining high standards for store appearance and providing fast and friendly service to customers.
Selling products to customers and providing excellent customer care.
Performing at a quick pace while having fun and working as part of a team to accomplish daily goals.
Coming up with great ideas to solve problems and thinking quickly.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or GED preferred
